title: Deforming convex real projective structures
abstract: In this paper we define new flows—eruption flows and internal bulging flows—on the deformation space of convex real projective structures. These flows are associated to internal parameters associated to a pair of pants decomposition.

keywords: Convex real projective structures Flows Projective invariants Hitchin component Locally homogeneous geometric structures
